description:
Same powerful, Bluesign® approved formula, just cheaper and with 74% less packaging. Revive your once-waterproof garments. Regular maintenance helps waterproof-breathable fabrics work their best. When water stops beading up and starts soaking in, this spray-on water proofer restores the DWR finish in your gear.

  • Helps maximize both water repellency and breathability
  • PFAS-free formula
  • Bluesign® approved product
  • Suitable for use on all GORE-TEX®, eVent and other waterproof-breathable fabrics
  • For best results, spray directly onto a freshly washed, damp garment from about 15cm away. Remove any excess drips with a clean cloth. Hang to dry naturally or follow drying instructions on the garment's care label
name: Grangers Performance Repel Plus Eco Refill Pouch 275ml
